weka.core.converters

Class Word2VecLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.converters.AbstractLoader
      • weka.core.converters.AbstractFileLoader
        • weka.core.converters.Word2VecLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.converters.BatchConverter, weka.core.converters.FileSourcedConverter, weka.core.converters.Loader, weka.core.EnvironmentHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class Word2VecLoader
extends weka.core.converters.AbstractFileLoader
implements weka.core.converters.BatchConverter
    Loads Word2Vec seriliazed embeddings into Weka.
